title: String to Buffer Conversion
description: This function converts a substring of a given string into a byte buffer, starting from a specified position and adhering to the maximum size constraints of the buffer. The function returns the position following the last byte written to the buffer.
name: _STRING_TO_BUFFER

input.name: STR
input.description: The input string to be converted to a byte buffer.

input.name: POS
input.description: The starting position in the byte buffer to begin writing the bytes.

input.name: PT
input.description: A pointer to the byte array where the converted bytes are stored.

input.name: SIZE
input.description: The size of the buffer, which defines the maximum number of bytes that can be written.

return_value.description: The position in the byte buffer after the last byte written from the input string.
